btn_save_next: Save and Proceed to Next Step
tip_config_dingding: Log in to the DingTalk Open Platform backend, complete the configuration according to the documentation, and publish the application Log in to Backend, How to Configure? After adding the application, copy the Client ID and API Client Secret and fill them in the configuration below
tip_copy_http_url: Copy the following HTTP address and fill it in the message receiving mode - select HTTP mode message receiving address in DingTalk application details > application capabilities > robot configuration
